name: project field
desc: Project the coordinates in any field from one coordinate system to another.

properties.name: Field Projection
properties.desc: The Field Projection controls gives a searchable interface for selecting EPSG codes.  EPSG1 should be the coordinate system the field is in currently.  EPSG2 is the desired output coordinate system.

properties.name: Image Projection
properties.desc: The Field Projection controls gives a searchable interface for selecting EPSG codes.  EPSG1 should be the coordinate system the field is in currently.  EPSG2 is the desired output coordinate system.

properties.name: File Tags
properties.desc: The File Tags string can be added to files using the REPROJECT option to project the contents of the file into the correct space when read.
